meanings.definition: To have a mistaken understanding or knowledge of something.
meanings.sent1: She was misknowing the directions and ended up lost.
meanings.sent2: He misknowing the answer to the question, thinking it was B instead of C.
meanings.sent3: The misknowing of the recipe led to a very interesting dish.
meanings.sent4: His misknowing of her feelings left him feeling lost in a sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The misknowing of the weather forecast resulted in a picnic on a rainy day.

meanings.definition: The act of misunderstanding or misinterpreting information.
meanings.sent1: The misknowing of the message caused unnecessary panic.
meanings.sent2: His constant misknowing of the situation made it hard to trust his judgment.
meanings.sent3: The comedy of errors was a result of the misknowing of each other's intentions.
meanings.sent4: The misknowing of the map led them deeper into the forest.
meanings.sent5: Her misknowing of the plot twist made the movie even more surprising.
